faq.question: Does IA Amélioration violate MLS Photo rules?
faq.answer: No, IA Amélioration improves existing Photo Qualité without changing reality. It's equivalent to Professionnel Photo editing, which is standard practice. Avoid misrepresentation by not adding Fonctionnalités that don't exist.

faq.question: How much can IA Amélioration increase property value?
faq.answer: Professional photos can help sell properties for 3-10% more. While AI doesn't directly add value, better presentation attracts more buyers and competitive offers.

faq.question: Can IA fix badly composed Photos?
faq.answer: IA can improve Qualité but can't fix poor composition or lighting. Start with well-composed Photos and use IA to enhance, not rescue, bad shots.
